item.title: Bunni DEX paused following $2.4M exploit of liquidity function
item.description: An exploit in Bunni's liquidity system led to a $2.4 million loss in stablecoins. To prevent further losses, the platform has temporarily halted all contracts.
item.author: curator@vektr.news (vektr)

item.title: ECB President Lagarde Calls For Firm Safeguards on Foreign Stablecoins
item.description: ECB President Lagarde stresses need for stablecoins to adhere to EU regulations before operating in the region.
item.author: curator@vektr.news (vektr)

item.title: Ray Dalio says soaring US debt threatens dollar, fueling demand for crypto and gold as alternatives
item.description: Ray Dalio believes stablecoins pose no risk, but predicts major upheaval in 5 years due to debt, politics, climate change, and AI.
item.author: curator@vektr.news (vektr)
